description: Displays the tags associated with a resource. Both sinks and links support tagging.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource that you want to view tags for. The ARN format of a sink is arn:aws:oam:Region:account-id:sink/sink-id The ARN format of a link is arn:aws:oam:Region:account-id:link/link-id For more information about ARN format, see CloudWatch Logs resources and operations.
